# Using Templates

The Global Security Bootcamp Core provides ready-to-use templates for all aspects of event planning and operations.

## Available Templates

- **Agendas**: Full-day and half-day event schedules
- **Communications**: Social media kit and press release templates
- **Operations**: Day-of runbook and incident brief templates
- **Slides**: Speaker notes and guidance for presentations

## How to Use Templates

1. **Copy** the template from `GlobalSecurityBootcampTemplate/templates/` to your event repository.
2. **Customize** for your city, dates, speakers, and focus areas.
3. **Review** against [Event Standards](../planning/event-standards.md) before finalizing.
4. **Share** with your team and get feedback.

## Template Index

- [Agendas](agendas.md) — Customize your event schedule
- [Communications](communications.md) — Social media and press materials
- [Operations & Runbooks](operations.md) — Day-of procedures and incident response
- [Slides & Speaker Notes](slides.md) — Presentation guidance

---

See each template guide for detailed customization examples and best practices.
